LeftMenu.PluginDescription: Position the dashboard menu to the left.
LeftMenu.SettingsIntroduction: The left menu plugin will move the reporting menu from the top to the left if enabled. This is especially useful for large displays.
LeftMenu.GlobalSettingDescription: Defines the system default for all of your users.
LeftMenu.GlobalSettingInlineHelp: Users are able to disable/enable the left menu independent of the system default.
LeftMenu.UserSettingInlineHelp: This will enable or disable the left menu only for you and not affect any other users. A Super User can change the default for all users.
